text: U bi rasti ewan pexemberen di berya te da (Muhemmed) hene! Ewanan ji bi viran hatine derewderandine. Idi ewan (pexemberan) li ser wan cefa u derewderandinen xwe, hew kiribune, heya ji wan (pexemberan ra) arikaraya me hatiye. U ji bona peyven (peymaniyen) Yezdan ra tu guhurandin tune ye. U bi sond! Ji te ra, ji wan serdaboriyen pexemberan hatiye
